attributes.action: give us tax credits on taxes (which are not Income Tax)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We go to work and we get taxed on what we earn. On top of they, we tax pay and duty again when we spend our money:
Road Tax
Petrol Duty + VAT
VAT
Council Tax
Alcohol duty
Tobacco duty
etc...

We already pay income tax on the money we earn. I propose the following:
Any tax (other than Income Tax) would qualify for a tax credit an amount equal to the duty paid on a product / service / license.

We should not be paying tax on income which has already been taxed.
